name: interhemispheric
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
anatomy
  specialized between the two hemispheres (= halves) of the brain: an interhemispheric cyst There remains much research to be done on interhemispheric switches.
between the two hemispheres (= halves) of the earth: There is evidence to suggest the existence of sporadic interhemispheric voyages before Columbus. a unique inter-racial and inter-hemispheric organization
More examplesFewer examplesInterhemispheric shift of language networks may occur in cases of large brain lesions.In patients with diminished interhemispheric inhibition, there was greater brain activation in secondary motor regions.The interhemispheric dissection and clipping were performed in twelve patients.
